name: DEMO: The Fox and the Mouse: A Dyslexic text based adventure
name_original: DEMO: The Fox and the Mouse: A Dyslexic text based adventure
description:
This is the demo of an upcoming a text based adventure game designed to make the player feel like a person with dyslexia. This is not what they actually see but simulates the some of the frustration dyslexics fell.

Full Game Coming soon!
